title: Task-Centered Instructional Design Strategy Course for Strengthening Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental organizational management experience and foundational leadership knowledge
context.additional_context: Corporate training course emphasizing the development of social leadership competencies applicable to real work environments, combining smartphone-based learning materials with offline workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world work scenarios with over 80% accuracy to identify core issues
Learners design collaboration strategies among team members through project-based tasks and apply them in at least three practical exercises
Learners demonstrate knowledge integration and practical application skills by achieving 75+ points in formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
